I know this is a stretch but thought maybe this might be a helpful addition to a next update to Quest/QuestKit...  obviously no hurry.

It would be wonderful (at least for me or, I would imagine, game designers that have a lot of rooms) if there was a way to alphabetize the room names in the "tree of stuff" in the GUI.  I know I can search for things with the built-in search option, but it would be nice to find a room AND the objects in that room quickly.  For me, I bounce around from room to room to edit, correct, reference rooms (or things in them) constantly.  Of course, I have NO IDEA how difficult this would be or if it is even possible.

Just a thought.
